availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard Pemberton, Sr. (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Sarah Pemberton. Father of Richard Pemberton, Walter W. Pemberton, Mary Ann Pemberton, Sarah J. Pemberton, Henry M. Pemberton, James A. Pemberton, and William C. Pemberton. Farmer in De Kalb County, Alabama, in 1850. Farmer in Princeton, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Alabama, De Kalb County, District 24, p. 408B-409A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 78.
